dc_title_s: Surface Water Areas, Middle Hudson sub-basin, 2000
dc_description_s: Large scale hydrography surface water areas tiled by Watershed Boundary Dataset (WBD) sub-basin. Surface water areas extracted from New York State Large Scale Hydrography. Connectors added as needed to create closed areas.  Continuous hydrography areas for mapping and modeling. Base data for creation of high resolution National Hydrography Dataset (NHD).
dc_creator_sm: New York State. Department of Environmental Conservation.
dc_publisher_sm: New York State. Department of Environmental Conservation.
dct_isPartOf_sm: Large Scale Hydrography Surface Water Areas
